13 double LeakageLosses::getExfiltratedGasesHeatContent() {
14 // const double tFurnace = specificGravity * ( 520.0 / ( 460 + leakageGasTemperature ) );
15 // const double specificHeatGassesAvgTemp = (leakageGasTemperature + 60.0) / 2.0;
16 
17  const double cfh = 1655 * coefficient * ( openingArea * 144 ) * pow( draftPressure / specificGravity, 0.5 );
18 
19 
20  const double scfh = cfh * pow( 520.0 / ( 460.0 + leakageGasTemperature ), 0.5 );
21 
22  // TODO find out if the documentation means tFurnace (in the code here) or the input parameter T_furnace (leakageGasTemperature here)
23  // TODO neither value produces the right numbers according to the documentation
24 // const double calc = (ambientTemperature + tFurnace) / 2.0;
25  const double calc = (ambientTemperature + leakageGasTemperature) / 2.0;
26  const double cpm = 0.2371 - (9 * pow(10, -6) * calc) + (7 * pow(10, -8) * pow(calc, 2)) - ((3 * pow(10, -11)) * pow(calc, 3));
27  const double cpsv = 0.0793 * cpm;
28 
29 // exfiltratedGasesHeatContent = cfh * specificHeatGassesAvgTemp * (leakageGasTemperature - ambientTemperature);
30  exfiltratedGasesHeatContent = cpsv * scfh * (leakageGasTemperature - ambientTemperature);
31 
32  return exfiltratedGasesHeatContent;
33 }
